description:
Sanji mixes it up with a deranged cook, Franky dukes it out with the newest member of CP9, and the Sniper King gets creative in his attempt to reach Robin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel de chefs ! Sanji contre l`art martial des nouilles !
Kokku Taiketsu! Sanji vs Ramen Kenpou
Showdown Between Cooks! Sanji vs. Ramen Kenpo
Битва коков! Санджи против Раменного Кемпо
صراع بين طباخين! سانجي ضد كينبو الرامين!
コック対決! サンジVSラーメン拳法
